H0.text: Which Sanskrit word appears as a concept in both Buddhism and Hinduism, etc., and means Law or Natural Law. Dharma

H1.text: Which Sanskrit word appears as a concept in both Buddhism and Hinduism, etc., and means Law or Natural Law. Karma

H2.text: Which Sanskrit word appears as a concept in both Buddhism and Hinduism, etc., and means Law or Natural Law. Rta

H3.text: Which Sanskrit word appears as a concept in both Buddhism and Hinduism, etc., and means Law or Natural Law. æ³•

A4.text: Dharma is a key concept in various Indian religions, including Buddhism and Hinduism.

A5.text: Buddhism held the Hindu view of Dharma as 'cosmic law', as in the working of Karma.
